* '''IRC Meeting - Thursday April 29^th^, 2010 9:00pm ''' - Please visit the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AlabamaTeam/Meetings|Meetings]]</nowiki> page to see what we will be discussing. Please try to attend as we begin planning for the future of the LoCo as we start moving toward Approved Status.

* '''The Alabama Team is going to shoot for getting Approved LoCo status.''' === About ===

  ''' The Alabama Team is a group of enthusiastic Ubuntu users who want to help spread the word and help others do the same about Ubuntu Linux in the Alabama area. We will supply tech help, advice, and support to those who need it. Install fests, tech shows, and meetings will be scheduled. '''

* Support Ubuntu Locally
